title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
EB: When a .java file is open in the editor and the user clicks the new class button with the 'Enclosing Type' option checked, the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank. It should default to the current type in the editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a .java file in the editor.
2. Click on the new class button.
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' option.
4. Note that the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank instead of defaulting to the current type in the editor.
